breakthroughPP.gui

Interface Showable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridPanel, InfoMovePanel, InfoPanel, MainFrame, TextOutput

    public interface Showable
    This interface provides the possibility to show a Board

    Georg-August University Goettigen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016

    Author:
    Jan-Philipp Burchert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(Viewer viewer, int color)
      Initialise a class with an information class to set for instance the size of the board
      void update()
      Updates the output by using the Functions of the Viewer interface.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Viewer viewer,
        int color)
          throws VisualisationException
        Initialise a class with an information class to set for instance the size of the board
        Parameters:
        viewer - Information class transfering data from a game board
        color - Color of the player managing the board specified in the interface Setting
        Throws:
        VisualisationException - if an problem occures which makes visualisation impossible

      • update

        void update()
            throws VisualisationException
        Updates the output by using the Functions of the Viewer interface.
        Throws:
        VisualisationException - if an error occures preventing update from successful visualisation
